title: Limited vehicles at fuel queues in Colombo; but high numbers in Kandy, Galle
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The number of vehicles lining up for fuel at filling stations in Colombo was at a low on Friday (27) morning, however, there were extremely long queues across Kandy, Galle, Badulla, and other townships.
